sentence.Network_en: I was as angry as a madwoman. I said,'Are you idiots?
sentence.Network_cn: 我真的很为那个疯女人生气, 我说, 你是个白痴 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: I get overwhelmed with deadlines and act like a madwoman on a crazy work bender.
sentence.Network_cn: 我为交稿日期抓狂,活像一台工作机器上的疯婆子.

mad英语的解释,... ... You must be mad to drive so fast! 你开得这样快, 简直疯了! madwoman 女疯子, 女狂人 mad 1. 狂怒, 气愤.

entry.tran: 疯女人；精神失常的女人
entry.def: A madwoman is a woman who is insane.

auth_sentence.content: When she repeatedly asked how many, her mother "became like a madwoman" and whipped her with an electric cable.
auth_sentence.res_content: When she repeatedly asked how many, her mother "became like a madwoman" and whipped her with an electric cable.
